title: President's Park (White House): 2009 - Present
body: 2009-Present National Christmas Trees       In 2011, the National Christmas tree was severely damaged in a wind storm. The tree was removed and replaced. However, the replacement tree did not survive long after it was transplanted onto the grounds. A new tree was planted in 2012, which has remained to the present day.                   2015 National Christmas Tree   10 Photos  Photos of the 2015 National Christmas Tree                        History of National Christmas Trees  1923 | 1924-1933 | 1934-1938 | 1939-1940 | 1941-1953 | 1954-1960 | 1961-1962 | 1963-1968 | 1969-1973 | 1974-1976 | 1977-1980 | 1981-1988 | 1989-1992 | 1993-2000 | 2001-2008 | 2009-present
